mapper.insert: insert into user (num, id, passwd, userName, email, point, created_at, updated_at) values (#{num}, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{point}, To_TIMESTAMP(#{created_at}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss.SSSSSX'), To_TIMESTAMP(#{updated_at}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss.SSSSSX')
mapper.select: select id, passwd, userName, point from user where id = #{id} and passwd = #{passwd}
